segments.text: What kinds of things do you like to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've always liked to draw and paint .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't know you knew how to draw and paint .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do it every once in a while .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long have you known how to do that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I first learned how to do it in high school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you take some sort of art class or something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have got to be talented .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have a talent . You just don't know what it is yet .
segments.speaker: S2
